theme: Pinatatag na Segurong Pangkalusugan ng Bawat Filipino (Strengthened Health Insurance of Every Filipino)
keyLegislation: Universal Health Care (UHC) Act of 2019 - ensuring equal access to quality health care
context: Year severely challenged by COVID-19 pandemic worldwide

pandemicResponse.legislation: Bayanihan to Heal as One Act (RA No. 11469)

healthWorkerProtection.coverage: Full financial risk protection for all health care workers
healthWorkerProtection.benefit: Inpatient case management with no co-payment (public and private facilities)
healthWorkerProtection.eligibility: All health workers hospitalized due to COVID-19, regardless of employment status

rtPCRAuditObservations.missingInformation: 26,448 validated tests lacked CIF Reference Number and member-patient info
rtPCRAuditObservations.testingFrequency: 764 members tested twice in one day
rtPCRAuditObservations.doubleDeclaration: 1,532 RT-PCR tests declared twice in line list
rtPCRAuditObservations.action: PRO NCR & Rizal directed to reconcile records

operationalHighlights.commitment: Quality and effective health benefits provision

operationalHighlights.initiative: Strengthen referral management system for overall quality of care

policies.unclaimedBenefits: May be reverted to fund after 2 years of publication on PhilHealth website

personnelManagement.action: Appointed 9 Executive and Managerial Officers per CSC rules
Approved designations and secondments from other agencies for continuity
Delegated authority to sign appointments for faster turnaround time

financialInformation.investingActivities: Cash inflows from matured time deposits
financialInformation.receivables: Balance for Due from LGUs noted
